continue.title: Looks like you didn't finish submitting the last screening you started - would you like to continue?

done.title: Your legal entity verification has been submitted!
done.description: Press the button below or refresh the page to submit another verification.
done.reset: Take me back to the start

legalEntity.title: Legal entity details:
legalEntity.name: Legal entity name
legalEntity.nameError: Please enter the name of the legal entity you wish to screen!
legalEntity.registryCodeLengthError: The registration code must contain least 5 characters
legalEntity.registryCodeLengthErrorEE: Estonian business registration code must contain 8 characters
legalEntity.registrationCodeError: Please enter the registration number of the legal entity you wish to screen!

representative.title: Representative details:
representative.firstNameError: Please make sure you enter the representative's first name
representative.lastNameError: Please make sure you enter the representative's last name

startScreening.termsAndConditionsPrefix: I confirm I agree to Entify
startScreening.termsAndConditionsError: Please review and accept the terms and conditions before continuing!

start.title: Verify your identity
descriptions: Please press Start to begin the verification process.
It will only take a couple of minutes.

documents.title: Document verification
documents.hint: Select the type of document you would like to upload
documents.driving_licence_hint: Front and back of the document
documents.national_identity_card_hint: Front and back of the document

complete.message: Thank you for submitting your identity verification!
complete.subMessage: Feel free to close this browser window or refer back to the self-service.

document.title: Continue verification on your mobile
document.take_photos: We'll walk you through taking the photos

face.title: Continue face verification on your mobile
face.take_photos: Complete face verification to prove it's really you

intro.sms: We'll SMS a secure link to your mobile (no app download required)
intro.return_computer: Return to your computer to complete your verification

link.title: Get your secure link
link.sub_title: We'll text a one-time secure link to your mobile

mobile_notification_sent.title: Check your mobile
mobile_notification_sent.submessage: We've sent a secure link to %{number}
mobile_notification_sent.bold_message: It may take a few minutes to arrive

tips.item_1: Keep this window open while using your mobile
tips.item_2: Your link will expire in one hour

title.submessage: Once you've finished we'll take you to the next step

tips.item_1: Keep this window open while using your mobile
tips.item_2: Your mobile link will expire in one hour

client_success.title: Uploads successful
client_success.sub_title: You can now return to your computer to continue
client_success.body: Your computer may take a few seconds to update

submit.title: Great, that's everything we need
submit.sub_title: We're now ready to verify your identity

sms_failed.instruction: Copy the link to your phone

lazy_loading.message: An error occurred while loading the component

invalid_number.message: Check that your number is correct

generic_client_error.instruction: You'll need to restart your verification on your computer
